name: BLACKBOX LSS Shining Immortal 黑箱LSS 闪耀的永生者
name_original: BLACKBOX LSS Shining Immortal 黑箱LSS 闪耀的永生者
description:
BLACKBOX LSS  Shining Immortal 黑箱LSS 闪耀的永生者  

 

 

 

This is a short visual novel game.  You will be playing the role as a new employee who has just joined the company for a month and pursuing the female boss.

 

这是一个很短的恋爱视觉小说。

 你将扮演一个刚入职一个月的新员工去追求憧憬的女性上司。

 

❤

 

The game contains yandere and horror elements.

这个游戏包含病娇和惊悚要素。

❤

 

The game takes an hour, and there are five endings. The bad endings will be skip quickly and the game will bring you back to the last choice, so you don't have to worry about forgetting to save the game.

 

流程是1个小时，有5种结局，坏结局将会快速略过，并将您带回上一个节点，所以请放心游玩，不用担心存档问题。

 

The whole game is pixel style. Pictures and music will present you with a short film of love.

 

游戏整体为像素风格，图片与音乐配合营造的演出将为您呈现一个恋爱短片。

 

The story is set in a near-future background, to be noticed it is only a small story from a large series.

 

背景偏向科幻未来，是在一个庞大世界观下的一则小故事。

 

The text is mostly dialogue and what the characters think. the words and sentences are simple and easy to understand. You only need to make some choices.

 

文本多为对话和角色内心所想，词句简单易懂，您只需要偶尔做一些选择，无需额外操作。

 

There are a few horror plots in the game. If you are aiming for a sweet love story it might be not desirable.

 

游戏内存在一些惊悚的描写，如果只是想阅读一个甜甜的恋爱故事，可能需要额外注意。

 

❤

Write/Art/Music/Sound Fif（Twi:@mffffv)
